subject: Re: [junit] Cannot instantiate test case:
msgSnippet: Test class should have constructor like this: public TestClass(String name) { super(name); } Vita ... -- Vitezslav Stejskal, Software engineer SUN Microsystems
messageBody:
Test class should have constructor like this:

public TestClass(String name) {
super(name);
}

Vita


Brian O'Halloran wrote:

> Can anyone offer any suggestions why I'm getting "Cannot instantiate test
> case:" failure? Thanks in advance. Brian
>
> FAILURES!!!
> Test Results:
> Run: 1 Failures: 1 Errors: 0
> There was 1 failure:
> 1) warning(junit.framework.TestSuite$1) "Cannot instantiate test case:
> testFrontEnd"
